layer.name: Skill
layer.definition: Get measurably better at what matters.

questions.text: My knowledge of proper form and technique for physical training is ...

answers.4: solid — I know how to train effectively, not just hard
answers.5: strong — I understand technique deeply and can coach others
answers.2: basic — I know a few things but often do exercises wrong
answers.3: developing — I have good form in some areas, poor in others
answers.1: absent — I just move and hope for the best

questions.text: My understanding of how to progressively build capacity is ...

answers.4: good — I know how to systematically build over time
answers.5: deep — I understand periodization, adaptation, and can design programs
answers.2: basic — I know I should progress but not how
answers.3: developing — I understand some principles of progression

questions.text: My ability to program my own training effectively is ...

answers.4: good — I can create programs that achieve my goals
answers.5: strong — I can design sophisticated training for various goals
answers.2: poor — I try but my programs don't work
answers.3: developing — I can design some effective workouts
answers.1: absent — I need someone to tell me what to do

questions.text: My skill in preventing injury and recovering from setbacks is ...

answers.4: good — I know how to train safely and recover well
answers.5: refined — I rarely get injured and know exactly how to rehab when I do
answers.2: basic — I know some injury prevention but still get hurt
answers.3: developing — I prevent some injuries, still deal with others
answers.1: absent — I get injured a lot and don't know how to recover

questions.text: My ability to assess my own physical state accurately is ...

answers.4: good — I know when to push and when to back off
answers.5: sharp — I read my body accurately and respond appropriately
answers.2: basic — I sometimes read signals but often miss them
answers.3: developing — I read some signals well, miss others
answers.1: poor — I can't tell when to push or back off
